description: Non material minor amendment to condition 31 (CFSH / BREEAM) of planning permission P102364 dated 23/03/2012. (see informative for amended condition).
decision_conditions:
The agreed amended wording to condition 31 is:

CONDITION: Evidence confirming that the development achieves Code for Sustainable Homes rating of no less than 'Level 3' for the:

1)  north west building; and
2)  north east building 

shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  The evidence shall be provided in the following formats and at the following times: 

a)   a design stage assessment, supported by relevant BRE interim certificate(s), shall be submitted at pre-construction stage prior to commencement of superstructure works on the north west and north east buildings; and 

b)   a post-construction assessment, supported by relevant BRE accreditation certificate(s), shall be submitted following the practical completion of each residential tower and prior to the first occupation of each of the residential towers in the north west and north east buildings.
